original_title: Great Violinists on The Bell Telephone Hour
overview: Legendary violinists of the 20th century, including performances by Isaac Stern, Zino Francescatti, Michael Rabin, Mischa Elman, Erica Morini, Yehudi Menuhin, David & Igor Oistrakh, and Ruggiero Ricci. Bonus selections by cellist Gregor Piatigorsky. The Bell Telephone Hour Orchestra conducted by Donald Voorhees (unless otherwise noted). Color, 90 minutes, 4:3, All regions
title: Great Violinists on The Bell Telephone Hour
